## SuggestIgnoreParams.clearIgnored() method

When name is provided remove all ignored decorations which match the named suggester. Otherwise remove \*\*all\*\* ignored decorations from the document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearIgnored(name?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
